jobData.title: E-commerce Website Development with Payment Integration
jobData.description:
We need a complete e-commerce website built from scratch for our online store. The website should include:

**Key Features Required:**
- Modern, responsive design with mobile-first approach
- Product catalog with search and filtering capabilities
- Shopping cart and checkout system
- User authentication and profile management
- Admin dashboard for inventory management
- Payment gateway integration (Stripe/PayPal)
- Order tracking and management system
- SEO optimization
- Analytics integration

**Technical Requirements:**
- Frontend: React.js or Vue.js
- Backend: Node.js with Express or Python with Django
- Database: MongoDB or PostgreSQL
- Payment: Stripe API integration
- Hosting: AWS or similar cloud platform

**Project Timeline:**
- Phase 1: Design and planning (1 week)
- Phase 2: Frontend development (2 weeks)
- Phase 3: Backend development (2 weeks)
- Phase 4: Payment integration (1 week)
- Phase 5: Testing and deployment (1 week)

**What We Provide:**
- Brand guidelines and logo
- Product images and descriptions
- Detailed wireframes
- Content for all pages

**What We Expect:**
- Clean, maintainable code
- Comprehensive documentation
- Testing on multiple devices and browsers
- 3 months of post-launch support
- Source code and deployment instructions

This is a long-term project with potential for ongoing maintenance and feature additions.

companyDetails.name: TechStart Solutions
companyDetails.description: A growing e-commerce company specializing in tech gadgets and accessories. We're expanding our online presence and need a robust platform to handle our growing customer base.

projectData.title: E-commerce Website Development with Payment Integration
projectData.description: Complete e-commerce website development project including frontend, backend, payment integration, and deployment. The project will be delivered in 5 milestones with clear deliverables and payment schedule.

milestones.title: Project Setup and Design Phase
milestones.description:
Complete project setup, database design, API architecture planning, and UI/UX mockups creation. Deliverables include:
- Database schema design
- API endpoint documentation
- Complete UI/UX mockups for all pages
- Project setup with development environment
- Git repository setup with proper branching strategy

milestones.title: Frontend Development - Core Features
milestones.description:
Develop the main frontend components including product catalog, user authentication, and shopping cart functionality. Deliverables include:
- Responsive product catalog with search/filter
- User registration and login system
- Shopping cart functionality
- Product detail pages
- User profile management
- Mobile-responsive design

milestones.title: Backend Development and API Integration
milestones.description:
Build the backend API, database integration, and core business logic. Deliverables include:
- Complete RESTful API development
- Database integration and models
- User authentication and authorization
- Product management system
- Order management system
- Admin dashboard backend

milestones.title: Payment Integration and Checkout System
milestones.description:
Implement secure payment processing and complete checkout flow. Deliverables include:
- Stripe payment gateway integration
- Secure checkout process
- Order confirmation system
- Payment receipt generation
- Error handling for payment failures
- PCI compliance measures

milestones.title: Testing, Deployment, and Documentation
milestones.description:
Final testing, deployment to production, and comprehensive documentation. Deliverables include:
- Complete testing on multiple devices/browsers
- Performance optimization
- Security testing and fixes
- Production deployment
- User documentation
- Admin documentation
- Source code handover

clientProfile.name: Sarah Johnson
clientProfile.title: Founder & CEO
clientProfile.bio: Entrepreneur with 8+ years in e-commerce and retail. Founded TechStart Solutions in 2020 and successfully launched 3 online stores. Looking to expand our digital presence with a robust e-commerce platform.

freelancerProfile.bio: Experienced full-stack developer with 6+ years specializing in e-commerce solutions. Expert in React.js, Node.js, and payment integrations. Successfully delivered 50+ e-commerce projects with 98% client satisfaction rate.
